name: Escape Game Museum
description:
Let's escape from the art museum by solving the mystery of all paintings.
Please enjoy the great escape from all 8 rooms.

【Features】
· There are 8 rooms to play and even hidden rooms!
· You can see hints when you get stuck
· With auto save function, you can play for free until the end

【Tips】
· Let's explore the room by tapping the screen
· You can move around the room by tapping the arrow at the bottom of the screen
· Tap on the acquired item to select it. Tap again to enlarge
· If you tap with an item selected, you can use that item
· You may be able to use another item for the enlarged item
